page.title: 05Farming in Winster valley
page.content: Bryan House is a grade 2 listed farm and runs a small general purpose and delivery stable. Green Yew is the main beef raising farm, again near the centre of the village, but grazing on fertile paddocks down to the river. Green Bank on the A5074 is much larger has two tower silos and a lot of other buildings all in use, breeds sheep. The whole valley is dotted with smaller ones which may only grow vegetables, or have orchards for the famous damson crop grown in this district, and also apples and pears. Very little is grown under glass in these farms.
